channel.title: What?
channel.description:
Here is line 469
i'm not sure what to do :/
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/441/captureypj.png/][IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/4520/captureypj.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Try this command.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126(Config.SERVER_NAME+" Online Players ("+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+")", 8144); int line = 8146; for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { Client o = (Client) p; c.getPA().sendFrame126(o.playerName, line); line++; } } }

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Do you have this in client.java?

public boolean validClient(int index) { Client p = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[index]; if ((p != null) && !p.disconnected) { return true; } return false; } public Client getClient(int index) { return ((Client) PlayerHandler.players[index]); }

Read full topic

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

tubefish:

what do you mean?

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) { c.sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players online."); c.getPA().sendFrame126(Config.SERVER_NAME+" - Online Players", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ "):", 8145); int line = 8147; for (int i = 1; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { client p = c.getclient(i); if (!c.validclient(i)) continue; if (p.playerName != null) { String title = ""; if (p.playerRights == 1) { title = "Mod, "; } else if (p.playerRights == 2) { title = "Admin, "; } title += "level-" + p.combatLevel; String extra = ""; if (c.playerRights > 0) { extra = "(" + p.playerId + ") "; } c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@" + extra + p.playerName + "@dbl@ ("+ title + ") @dre@Kills: @dbl@ " + p.KC + ", @dre@Deaths: @dbl@"+ p.DC, line); line++; } } c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); }

Try that

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Use my ::players command and lets see if that would change it

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
				c.sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players online.");
				c.getPA().sendFrame126(Config.SERVER_NAME+" - Online Players", 8144);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ "):", 8145);
				int line = 8147;
				for (int i = 1; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					Client p = c.getClient(i);
					if (!c.validClient(i))
						continue;
					if (p.playerName != null) {
						String title = "";
						if (p.playerRights == 1) {
							title = "Mod, ";
						} else if (p.playerRights == 2) {
							title = "Admin, ";
						}
						title += "level-" + p.combatLevel;
						String extra = "";
						if (c.playerRights > 0) {
							extra = "(" + p.playerId + ") ";
						}
						c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@" + extra + p.playerName + "@dbl@ ("+ title + ") @dre@Kills: @dbl@ " + p.KC + ",  @dre@Deaths: @dbl@"+ p.DC, line);
						line++;
					}
				}
				c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
				c.flushOutStream();
			}

You can use that but you have 2 player commands why have 2 of them remove one… i suggest you remove both and replace with mine since mine is more advanced.

Read full topic
